verses.english: When the Occurrence occurs,
verses.hausa: Idan mai aukuwa ta auku.

verses.english: There is, at its occurrence, no denial.
verses.hausa: Bãbu wani (rai) mai ƙaryatãwa ga aukuwarta.

verses.english: It will bring down [some] and raise up [others].
verses.hausa: (Ita) mai ƙasƙantãwa ce, mai ɗaukakãwa.

verses.english: When the earth is shaken with convulsion
verses.hausa: Idan aka girgiza ƙasã girgizwa.

verses.english: And the mountains are broken down, crumbling
verses.hausa: Kuma aka niƙe duwãtsu, niƙẽwa.

verses.english: And become dust dispersing.
verses.hausa: Sai suka kasance ƙũra da ake wãtsarwa.

verses.english: And you become [of] three kinds:
verses.hausa: Kuma kun kasance nau'i uku.

verses.english: Then the companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?
verses.hausa: Watau mazõwa dãma. Mẽne ne mazõwa dãma?

verses.english: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?
verses.hausa: Da mazõwa hagu. Mẽne ne mazõwa hagu?

verses.english: And the forerunners, the forerunners -
verses.hausa: Da waɗanda suka tsẽre. Sũ wɗanda suka tsẽren nan,

verses.english: Those are the ones brought near [to Allah]
verses.hausa: Waɗancan, sũ ne waɗanda aka kusantar.

verses.english: In the Gardens of Pleasure,
verses.hausa: A ckin Aljannar ni'ima.

verses.english: A [large] company of the former peoples
verses.hausa: Jama'a ne daga mutãnen farko.

verses.english: And a few of the later peoples,
verses.hausa: Da kaɗan daga mutãnen ƙarshe.

verses.english: On thrones woven [with ornament],
verses.hausa: (Sunã) a kan wasu gadãje sãƙaƙƙuu.

verses.english: Reclining on them, facing each other.
verses.hausa: Sunã gincire a kansu, sunã mãsu kallon jũna.

verses.english: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal
verses.hausa: Wasu yara samãri na dindindin gẽwaya a kansu.

verses.english: With vessels, pitchers and a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring -
verses.hausa: Da wasu kõfuna da shantula da hinjãlai daga (giya) mai ɓuɓɓuga.

verses.english: No headache will they have therefrom, nor will they be intoxicated -
verses.hausa: Bã a sanya musu cĩwon jirĩ sabõda ita, kuma bã su buguwa.

verses.english: And fruit of what they select
verses.hausa: Da wasu 'ya'yan itãcen marmari daga irin waɗanda suke zãɓe.

verses.english: And the meat of fowl, from whatever they desire.
verses.hausa: Da nãman tsuntsãye daga wanda suke ganin sha'awa.

verses.english: And [for them are] fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes,
verses.hausa: Da wasu mãtã mãsu fararen idanu da girmansu.

verses.english: The likenesses of pearls well-protected,
verses.hausa: Kamar misãlan lu'ulu'u wanda aka ɓõye.

verses.english: As reward for what they used to do.
verses.hausa: A kan sakamakon, dõmin abin da suka kasance sunã aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: لَا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا تَأْثِيمًا
verses.english: They will not hear therein ill speech or commission of sin -
verses.hausa: Bã su jin wata yãsassar magana a cikinta, kuma bã su jin sun yi laifi.

verses.english: Only a saying: "Peace, peace."
verses.hausa: Sai dai wata magana (mai dãɗi): Salãmun, Salãmun.

verses.english: The companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?
verses.hausa: Da mazõwa dãma. Mẽne ne mazõwa dãma?

verses.english: [They will be] among lote trees with thorns removed
verses.hausa: (Sunã) a cikin itãcen magarya maras ƙaya.

verses.english: And [banana] trees layered [with fruit]
verses.hausa: Da wata ayaba mai yawan 'ya'ya.

verses.english: And shade extended
verses.hausa: Da wata inuwa mĩƙaƙƙiya.

verses.english: And water poured out
verses.hausa: Da wani ruwa mai gudãna.

verses.english: And fruit, abundant [and varied],
verses.hausa: Da wasu 'ya'yan itacen marmari mãsu yawa.

verses.english: Neither limited [to season] nor forbidden,
verses.hausa: Bã su yankẽwa kuma bã a hana su.

verses.english: And [upon] beds raised high.
verses.hausa: Da wasu shimfiɗu maɗaukaka.

verses.english: Indeed, We have produced the women of Paradise in a [new] creation
verses.hausa: Lalle Mũ, Mun ƙãga halittarsu ƙãgãwa.

verses.english: And made them virgins,
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan Muka sanya su budurwai.

verses.english: Devoted [to their husbands] and of equal age,
verses.hausa: Mãsu son mazansu, a cikin tsãrã ɗaya.

verses.english: For the companions of the right [who are]
verses.hausa: Ga mazõwa dãma.

verses.english: A company of the former peoples
verses.hausa: Wata ƙungiya ce daga mutãnen farko.

verses.english: And a company of the later peoples.
verses.hausa: Da wata ƙungiya daga mutãnen ƙarshe.

verses.english: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?
verses.hausa: Mazõwa hagu, Mẽne ne mazõwa hagu?

verses.english: [They will be] in scorching fire and scalding water
verses.hausa: Sunã a cikin wata iskar zãfi da wani ruwan zãfi.

verses.english: And a shade of black smoke,
verses.hausa: Da wata inuwa ta hayãƙi mai baƙi.

verses.english: Neither cool nor beneficial.
verses.hausa: Bã mai sanyi ba, kuma bã mai wata ni'ima ba.

verses.english: Indeed they were, before that, indulging in affluence,
verses.hausa: Lalle sũ, sun kasance a gabãnin wannan waɗanda aka jiyar dãɗi.

verses.english: And they used to persist in the great violation,
verses.hausa: Kuma sun kasance sunã dõgẽwa a kan mummũnan zunubi mai girma.

verses.arabic: وَكَانُوا۟ يَقُولُونَ أَئِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.english: And they used to say, "When we die and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?
verses.hausa: Kuma sun kasance sunã cẽwa: "Shin idan mun mutukuma muko kasance turɓãya da ƙasũsuwa shin lalle mũ waɗanda zã a kõma rãyarwa ne haƙĩƙatan?"

verses.english: And our forefathers [as well]?"
verses.hausa: "Shin, kuma da ubanninmu na farko?"

verses.english: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, the former and the later peoples
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Lalle mutãnen farko da na ƙarshe."

verses.english: Are to be gathered together for the appointment of a known Day."
verses.hausa: "Tabbas, waɗanda ake tãrãwa ne a cikin wani yini sananne."

verses.english: Then indeed you, O those astray [who are] deniers,
verses.hausa: "Sa'an nan lalle ku, ya kũ ɓatattu, mãsu ƙaryatãwa!"

verses.english: Will be eating from trees of zaqqum
verses.hausa: "Lalle mãsu cĩ ne daga wata itãciya ta zaƙƙum (ɗanyen wutã)."

verses.english: And filling with it your bellies
verses.hausa: "Har za ku zama mãsu cika cikunna daga gare ta."

verses.english: And drinking on top of it from scalding water
verses.hausa: "Sa'an nan kuma mãsu shã ne, a kan wannan abin cin, daga ruwan zãfi."

verses.english: And will drink as the drinking of thirsty camels.
verses.hausa: "Ku zama mãsu shã irin shan rãƙuma mãsu ƙishirwa."

verses.english: That is their accommodation on the Day of Recompense.
verses.hausa: Wannan ita ce liyãfarsu a rãnar sakamako.

verses.english: We have created you, so why do you not believe?
verses.hausa: Mũ ne Muka halitta ku, to, don me bã zã ku gaskata ba?

verses.english: Have you seen that which you emit?
verses.hausa: Shin kuma kun ga abin da kuke fitarwa na maniyyi?

verses.english: Is it you who creates it, or are We the Creator?
verses.hausa: Shin kũ ne kuke halitta shi, kõ kuwa mũ ne Mãsu halittãwa?

verses.arabic: نَحْنُ قَدَّرْنَا بَيْنَكُمُ ٱلْمَوْتَ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
verses.english: We have decreed death among you, and We are not to be outdone
verses.hausa: Mũ ne Muka ƙaddara mutuwa a tsakãninku, kuma ba Mu zama Mãsu gajiyãwa ba,

verses.arabic: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ أَمْثَـٰلَكُمْ وَنُنشِئَكُمْ فِى مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: In that We will change your likenesses and produce you in that [form] which you do not know.
verses.hausa: A kan Mu musanya waɗansu (mutãne) kamarku, kuma Mu mayar da ku a cikin wata halitta da ba ku sani ba.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْتُمُ ٱلنَّشْأَةَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ فَلَوْلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.english: And you have already known the first creation, so will you not remember?
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle, ne haƙĩƙa, kun san halittar farko, to, don me ba zã ku yi tunãni ba?

verses.english: And have you seen that [seed] which you sow?
verses.hausa: Shin, kuma kun ga abin da kũke nõmãwa?

verses.english: Is it you who makes it grow, or are We the grower?
verses.hausa: Shin, kũ ne ke tsirar da shi kõ kuwa Mũ ne Mãsu tsirarwa?

verses.arabic: لَوْ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ حُطَـٰمًا فَظَلْتُمْ تَفَكَّهُونَ
verses.english: If We willed, We could make it [dry] debris, and you would remain in wonder,
verses.hausa: Dã Munã so lalle, da Mun sanya shi bũsasshiyar ciyãwa, sai ku yini kunã mãmãkin bãƙin ciki.

verses.english: [Saying], "Indeed, we are [now] in debt;
verses.hausa: (Kunã cẽwa) "Lalle haƙĩƙa an azã mana tãra!"

verses.english: Rather, we have been deprived."
verses.hausa: "Ã'a, mun dai zama waɗanda aka hanã wa!"

verses.english: And have you seen the water that you drink?
verses.hausa: Shin, kuma kun ga ruwa wannan da kuke sha?

verses.arabic: ءَأَنتُمْ أَنزَلْتُمُوهُ مِنَ ٱلْمُزْنِ أَمْ نَحْنُ ٱلْمُنزِلُونَ
verses.english: Is it you who brought it down from the clouds, or is it We who bring it down?
verses.hausa: Shin, kũ ne kuke saukar da shi daga girgije, kõ kuwa Mũne Mãsu saukarwa?

verses.arabic: لَوْ نَشَآءُ جَعَلْنَـٰهُ أُجَاجًا فَلَوْلَا تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.english: If We willed, We could make it bitter, so why are you not grateful?
verses.hausa: Dã Mun so, dã Mun mayar da shi ruwan zartsi. To don me bã ku gõdẽwa?

verses.english: And have you seen the fire that you ignite?
verses.hausa: Shin, kuma kun ga wutã wannan da kuke ƙyastãwa?

verses.arabic: ءَأَنتُمْ أَنشَأْتُمْ شَجَرَتَهَآ أَمْ نَحْنُ ٱلْمُنشِـُٔونَ
verses.english: Is it you who produced its tree, or are We the producer?
verses.hausa: Shin, kũ ne kuke ƙagã halittar itãciyarta, kõ kuwa Mũ ne Mãsu ƙãgãwa?

verses.english: We have made it a reminder and provision for the travelers,
verses.hausa: Mũ ne Muka sanya ta wata abar wa'azi da jin dãɗi ga matafiya a cikin jẽji.

verses.english: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.
verses.hausa: Sai ka tsarkake sũnan Ubangijinka Mai girma.

verses.english: Then I swear by the setting of the stars,
verses.hausa: To, bã sai Na yi rantsuwa ba da lõkutan fãɗuwar taurãri.

verses.english: And indeed, it is an oath - if you could know - [most] great.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne' haƙĩƙa, rantsuwa ce mai girma, dã kun sani.

verses.english: Indeed, it is a noble Qur'an
verses.hausa: Lalle shi (wannan littãfi), haƙĩƙa, abin karantãwa ne mai daraja.

verses.english: In a Register well-protected;
verses.hausa: A cikin wani littafi tsararre.

verses.english: None touch it except the purified.
verses.hausa: Bãbu mai shãfa shi fãce waɗanda aka tsarkake.

verses.english: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.
verses.hausa: Wanda aka saukar ne daga Ubangijin halitta.

verses.english: Then is it to this statement that you are indifferent
verses.hausa: Shin, to, wannan lãbãrin ne kuke mãsu wulãkantãwa?

verses.english: And make [the thanks for] your provision that you deny [the Provider]?
verses.hausa: Kuma kunã sanya arzikinku (game da shi) lalle kũ, ku ƙaryata (shi)?

verses.english: Then why, when the soul at death reaches the throat
verses.hausa: To, don me idan rai ya kai ga maƙõshi? (Kusa da mutuwa).

verses.english: And you are at that time looking on -
verses.hausa: Alhãli kuwa kũ, a lõklcin nan, kunã kallo.

verses.arabic: وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنكُمْ وَلَـٰكِن لَّا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.english: And Our angels are nearer to him than you, but you do not see -
verses.hausa: Kuma Mũ ne mafi kusanta gare shi daga gare ku, to, amma kũ bã ku gani.

verses.english: Then why do you not, if you are not to be recompensed,
verses.hausa: To, don me in dai kun kasance bã waɗanda zã a yi wa sakamako ba?

verses.english: Bring it back, if you should be truthful?
verses.hausa: Ku mayar da shi (cikin jikinsa) har idan kun kasance mãsu gaskiya.

verses.english: And if the deceased was of those brought near to Allah,
verses.hausa: To, amma idan (mai mutuwar) ya kasance daga makusanta,

verses.english: Then [for him is] rest and bounty and a garden of pleasure.
verses.hausa: Sai hũtawa da kyakkyawan abinci da Aljannar ni'ima.

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنْ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلْيَمِينِ
verses.english: And if he was of the companions of the right,
verses.hausa: Kuma amma idan ya kasance daga mazõwa dãma,

verses.english: Then [the angels will say], "Peace for you; [you are] from the companions of the right."
verses.hausa: Sai (a ce masa) aminci ya tabbata a gare ka daga mazõwa dãma.

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
verses.english: But if he was of the deniers [who were] astray,
verses.hausa: Kuma amma idan ya kasance daga mãsu ƙaryatãwar, ɓatattun,

verses.english: Then [for him is] accommodation of scalding water
verses.hausa: Sai wata liyãfa ta ruwan zãfi.

verses.english: And burning in Hellfire
verses.hausa: Da ƙõnuwa da Jahĩm,

verses.english: Indeed, this is the true certainty,
verses.hausa: Lalle wannan, haƙĩƙa, ita ce gaskiya ta yaƙĩni.

verses.english: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka, ka tsarkake sũnan Ubangijinka, Mai karimci.
